channel.title: Clicking a button
channel.description: Hi, I made a custom interface to go with my voting 4 cash system. All is fine, but if you mass click the button you can get like 5 rewards, does anyone know how to stop the button being clicked more than once.

item.title: Clicking a button
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Simply add a timer that decreases once it is above 0, and then make it so if the timer is above 0 you cannot click the button.

Itâ€™s VERY easy.

Read full topic
